section.name: Installation

ol.li: Install Java JRE version 1.2 or better on your computer, select the JRE dowload for your computer
Set the JAVA_HOME environment variable to your java installation directory

(optional) Set the CVSGRAB_HOME environment variable to your cvsgrab installation directory, for example CVSGRAB_HOME=c:\cvsgrab, this is required for the batch script if you don't run it from its install directory.

section.p:
Note: On Windows, environment variables can be defined from the Dos command line with:
set ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE = value
Or for Windows XP, from Control Panel / System / Advanced tab / Environment variables button

To run cvsgrab, from the command line do:
cd <cvsgrab install dir>
cvsgrab <options>
